name: Magnet 'n' Iron
description:
An excellent game; 10/10
- Absolutely not my mom

This is a retro-styled game where you need to solve puzzles using magnetism to get to the end!

Controls

WASD, DPad and Any analog stick - Move the magnet around

Esc, Start: Pause the game

Alt+Enter: Toggle fullscreen

Happy WeeklyGameJam #134 :)
